Make Your City Better, Report Civic Issues

CityCare is a platform for citizens to report civic issues, track their resolution, and contribute to making our city cleaner, safer, and more beautiful.

How CityCare Works

Our simple three-step process makes it easy to report issues and track their resolution

Report Issue

Easily report civic issues with location, description, and photos using our simple form.

Track Progress

Monitor the status of your reported issues with real-time updates and notifications.

Issue Resolved

Get notified when your reported issue is resolved and verify the solution.

Civic Sense & Community Guidelines

Learn how to be a responsible citizen and contribute to a better community

Proper Waste Disposal

Always use designated bins for garbage disposal. Segregate waste into recyclable and non-recyclable categories.

Road Safety

Follow traffic rules, use pedestrian crossings, and avoid jaywalking. Report damaged roads or missing signage.

Green Spaces

Respect public parks and gardens. Avoid plucking flowers or damaging plants. Keep these areas clean.

Noise Pollution

Maintain reasonable noise levels, especially during night hours. Use horns sparingly and avoid loud gatherings in residential areas.

Water Conservation

Report water leaks promptly. Use water responsibly and avoid wastage. Harvest rainwater where possible.

Community Participation

Participate in community clean-up drives and awareness programs. Be an active, responsible citizen.
